title: Is it authentic to recite Surah kahf on Friday and what time should we recite it? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: also part of the Sunnah or the recommended things to do on a Friday is to recite Surat al-kahf and again the time of reciting surah al-kahf is from the fetcher of Friday till the sunset of Friday so it's during the daytime not before that and the hadith that supports this was authenticated by sheikh al albani sharon bass shoulda they mean yet many other scholars say that it is not authentic and this comes under the category of authority are men therefore if a person does it there is no problem in that insha'Allah especially with these great Imams authenticating it
